name: UpdateBlogAuthorLanguages
description:
Set new languages for each blog author in a group.

Use this tool to explicitly update the languages associated with each blog author in a multi-language group.

parameters.name: update_languages_request
parameters.description: JSON object containing a map of object IDs to languages and the primary object ID in a multi-language group.

languages.description: Map of object IDs to associated languages of object in the multi-language group.

primaryId.description: ID of the primary object in the multi-language group.

value_schema.description: The JSON representation of the UpdateLanguagesRequest object.
